text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For a while after the tryouts, Daiwa<n>Scarlet was constantly
approached by<n>trainers attempting to scout her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But now...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Hm? What, is nobody going to talk to<n>Scarlet?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I've set my sights on Vodka. No<n>matter how much potential
Scarlet has,<n>her personality is going to make<n>things
difficult...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Well, you have a point there. Guess<n>I'll try speaking to
Vodka too.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hmph, now that's more like it! The<n>annoying crowd's gone,
so I can<n>finally focus on my training.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
At least, that's what I'd like to say.<n>Hey! What are you still
doing here?!
choice_data_list: I want to talk with you.
I want to talk with you.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Oh, could it be that you still think<n>I'm a perfect honor
student who'll<n>listen to whatever you say?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Since you're still here, I'll let you inon a secret. It was all an act.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
This is the real me! And like those<n>guys from earlier
said—I'm stubborn,<n>selfish, and short-tempered.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Well? Your dreams crushed yet?<n>Good, then scurry along,
shoo.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...What? Were you even listening to<n>me?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'm saying I'm not the good girl you<n>think I am! Get it into
that thick head of<n>yours already!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Tracen Academy's packed with fast<n>runners! And me, I'm
the one who<n>decided to put on airs, get cocky, and<n>then
lose pathetically!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What do you know?! I don't need<n>your pity!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Because... I get it. All I do is mouth off<n>about being the
"number one this", the<n>"number one that"—but it's all<n>
talk—it's not real!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I lost to Vodka once, and here I am<n>wallowing in self-pity
and going on<n>reckless training runs... Even I know<n>that
I'm being unreasonable!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
But... what else can I do?! If I'm not<n>number one, then how
can I even face<n>myself?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I have to be number one in speed, in<n>strength! Number one
in popularity, in<n>fans—and I won't settle for anything<n>else!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I won't be satisfied unless I'm all of<n>those things. That's
the kind of<n>person I am, take it or leave it!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: To stay true to myself—I have to keep<n>on being number one!
choice_data_list: That's why I'm here—to support you.
That's why I'm here—to support you.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...H-huh?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Wait, hold up. You're saying thatafter listening to my rant... Areyou really that clueless?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Take a hint, pal! I told you, I'm a<n>stubborn girl who's
obsessed with<n>being number one!
choice_data_list: Then let's become number one together.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Tch, what's your problem! Why're<n>you still trying to scout
me?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'll say this now, but I'm not going to<n>just nod my head and
listen to<n>everything you say, you know?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
And if I don't like your training menu,<n>I won't stop bugging
you about it! Are<n>you willing to deal with all of that?!
choice_data_list: We can discuss all that until we agree!
We can discuss all that until we agree!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...Wh-what the heck is with you?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Saying you want to support me... that<n>we'll do this together...
Hey, were you<n>serious about all that?
choice_data_list: I'll be your number one trainer.
I'll be your number one trainer.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...Hmph. Could you not steal my<n>catchphrase like that?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Geez... Looks like I've been scouted...by a real weirdo. Sniffle...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Daiwa Scarlet bursts into tears, as if<n>she's been freed from
the heavy<n>burdens weighing her down.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A little while later...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I wonder how long it's been since I<n>cried in front of
someone else.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Not really in the mood torun anymore. I guess I should headback.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Honestly, I've been feeling sluggish<n>recently. So I think... I'll
tuck in early<n>for once.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As Daiwa Scarlet walks away, I<n>notice that she's lost the
spirit she<n>once had. Looks like the second place<n>finish at
the tryouts really did a<n>number on her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Still brainstorming ways to get her<n>confidence back, I decide
to pay the<n>cafeteria a visit.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yoohoo, Vodka!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, it's just Teio.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Whaddaya mean, JUST?! ...Youokay Vodka? You've got this boredlook on your face lately.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Not really... You're just imaginin'<n>things.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It's just... Recently, she's always<n>walkin' around with that
dumb look on<n>her face...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: She? Oh, you mean Scarlet? She'syour roommate and rival, after all.'Course you'd worry!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Th-that's not—We're not like that...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
But you're right, she's been pretty<n>down in the dumps. I
wonder if losing<n>to you at the tryouts was a big shock<n>for
her?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
...Y'know, I just didn't think she was<n>the type to give up
this easily.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Vodka?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Tch... Forget it. Whatever, one less<n>rival for me to worry
about. Catch ya<n>later.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hey Vodka, wait up! I said waaait!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I think I might have the perfect<n>solution to all this.
